creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings and Prints of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
description: man with unkempt hair and beard, seated on a stool, shoulders slumped, wearing a shirt, pants and vest, looking down at a pipe held in his PR hand; glass held in his PL hand; bottle on table behind him
marks:
Signature and Inscription

lower margin, LRC, in LLC, in the print: [T. Ribot]
title: Une grande douleur (A Great Sadness)
